title: Sweeping All The Rewards (Part 2)
body:
Sweeping All The Rewards (Part 2)

"Let's go," Evan said to Albelu who charged towards the golden platform without hesitation.

'I doubt this illusion formation will be able to affect me.' Evan thought to himself as Albelu stepped inside the area covered by the formation.

At first, Evan didn't understand what kind of formation it was, but when he used his spiritual senses, he felt some energy waves coming out of the formation that were trying to affect his mind and soul.

After feeling those energy waves and seeing Shawn's unmoving body, Evan easily understood that it was an illusion formation, and after considering his current spiritual power that is already comparable to an S rank hunter, Evan refused to believe that this formation could affect him.

'There is no way they will create formations that can affect even S rank hunters when the participants are just B+ rank hunters' Evan thought as Albelu finally stepped inside the formation.
